name: Merchant Warrior PAY.Link for WooCommerce
author: BAKKBONE Australia

sections.description:
Uses Merchant Warrior’s PAY.Link to create a hosted payments experience. Customise the branding of the payments experience via Merchant Warrior’s Barracks portal.

Merchant Warrior is an Australian-based fintech offering a variety of payments solutions in Australia, New Zealand, and more.

Sign up for Merchant Warrior today:

  • Merchant Warrior Website
  • Call 1300 CALL MW (22 55 69)
  • Sign up via BAKKBONE (developer of this plugin) for a supported onboarding process: Apply Here – Australian customers only
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Search for “PAY.Link” in the Plugin Repository from the Plugins > Add New screen

Manual installation

  1. Unzip the plugin archive on your computer
  2. Upload ‘mwhp-for-woocommerce’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What plugins do I need?

Required:

  • WooCommerce

short_description: Integrates Merchant Warrior's PAY.Link technology as a payment gateway for Woocommerce
